CustomField.formula: IF(Transaction_Value_for_Fee_Calc__c >= Third_Ratchet_To_Amount__c, (Third_Ratchet_To_Amount__c - Third_Ratchet_From_Amount__c) * Third_Ratchet_Percent__c, IF((Transaction_Value_for_Fee_Calc__c > Third_Ratchet_From_Amount__c) && (Transaction_Value_for_Fee_Calc__c < Third_Ratchet_To_Amount__c), (Transaction_Value_for_Fee_Calc__c -Third_Ratchet_From_Amount__c)*Third_Ratchet_Percent__c, 0) )
CustomField.label: Third Ratchet Total
